issue.title: [CF 1366] Rectangular Icons
issue.body:
Hiyo it would be nice if you could add the option of having rectangular icons. For some scenarios its a waste of vertical space to have square icons.


> Posted by CurseForge user Schlurcher | Imported from CurseForge issue #1366 | Raw

comments.body:
Anything you want along these lines can be done with a Masque skin. This isn't an option that will ever be added directly to TMW.

 

For example,

http://www.wowinterface.com/downloads/info22113-MasqueRectangle.html#info

Edited Jan 29, 2017

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
